    Package Description
    com.guardtime.ksi
    KSI API interface.
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory
    Provides classes to decode and encode in-memory KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier
    Provides classes and interfaces to verify KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies

      Convenience method to verify KSI signature.Uses the KSIExtenderClient defined by KSIBuilder.setKsiProtocolExtenderClient(KSIExtenderClient) method.
      VerificationResult KSI.verify(VerificationContext context, Policy policy)
      This method is used to verify the keyless signature.

      Subinterfaces of Policy in com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ContextAwarePolicy
      ContextAwarePolicy extends the Policy interface to support context.
      Classes in com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies that implement Policy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CalendarBasedVerificationPolicy
      Calendar-based verification takes as input the computed output hash of aggregation hash chains and the `aggregation time'.
      class  ContextAwarePolicyAdapter 
      class  InternalVerificationPolicy
      This policy is used to check keyless signature internal consistency.
      class  KeyBasedVerificationPolicy
      KSI Signature verification policy.
      class  PublicationsFileBasedVerificationPolicy
      This rule can be used to verify signatures using publications file.
      class  UserProvidedPublicationBasedVerificationPolicy
      This policy can be used to verify keyless signatures using used provided publication.
